mapper.insert:
insert into BTH_MCHT_LIST_TEMP_INFO
MCHT_ID,
CHK_DATE,
STATUS,
CRT_TM,
LAST_UPD_TM,
#{mchtId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{chkDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{crtTm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{lastUpdTm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update BTH_MCHT_LIST_TEMP_INFO
CHK_DATE = #{chkDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CRT_TM = #{crtTm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LAST_UPD_TM = #{lastUpdTm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where MCHT_ID = #{mchtId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
insert into BTH_MCHT_LIST_TEMP_INFO (select mcht_id,#{chkDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'00',sysdate,null from mcht_base_info where mcht_state not in ('10','12','99'))
mapper.select:
select count(1) from BTH_MCHT_LIST_TEMP_INFO where 1=1
and CHK_DATE = #{chkDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
